thread.title: Vijay Antony Miya George Yaman collects rs 1 crore and 4 lakhs in Chennai Box office - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Vijay Antony Miya George Yaman collects rs 1 crore and 4 lakhs in Chennai Box office - Tamil Movie News

title: Vijay Antony Miya George Yaman collects rs 1 crore and 4 lakhs in Chennai Box office - Tamil Movie News
text: Vijay Antony's 'Yaman' censored Actor Vijay Antony's 'Yaman' which was the big release over the weekend has taken a Good opening in Chennai Box office and the Jeeva Shankar directorial has crossed the one crore mark of collections in its first three days of release. On March 24, 2017,'Yaman' released in 29 screens across Chennai and a total of 299 shows were screened on the first three days. With this, the film has collected Rs.1,04,39,510 with an average occupancy rate of 85%. The film starring Vijay Antony and Miya George in lead roles is a commercial political thriller and it has generated positive reviews. It is expected to hold on well in the weekdays and add up as the third consecutive hit film for Vijay Antony after 'Pichaikkaran' and 'Saithan'.
